data.text: @DanWellard Hi Dan! We apologise that you felt that WIZZ let you down on this occasion. We are doing our best to improve our customer experience and would like to learn more about where we fell short this time. We suggest you submit a complaint via the link: https://t.co/goYYi8Y6DI.

@Dionisio79 Hi there! A foldable baby stroller or a small foldable cot travel are free of charge (will be loaded in aircraft hold). In order to take car seat on board you have to purchase extra seat. You can take one cabin baggage for each passneger. 
Have a good day:)

data.text: @seel_media Hi There! We're truly sorry for the inconvenience. Due to the busy summer season, there may be delays in receiving responses from our customer relations team. @bishnuda1 Hi. It costs 25 EUR/flight/passenger at the airport. Please note that if you purchase it there, you may be required to pay an additional fee to Wizz Air’s handling agent beyond the service fee defined. Priority also has a max. limit, so it can also be sold out by then.

data.text: @Thebiggestfeet Hi there! Our colleagues make sure to reply in the 30 days timeframe after your last sent email. If you didn't receive any e-mails within this timeframe, please reach via our live chat channel and our colleagues will inform you. https://t.co/th7YMTeRwK

@caprice1980 @WizzAirNot Hi. Please try using a different device. We'd suggest to use a computer or laptop with the newest version of Google Chrome browser as the site is optimalized to that. You can also try clearing your browser history and cookies as those might also affect the website.

data.text: @eatcottonballs Hi. If you need help with getting a refund then please contact us via the Live Chat or Call Centre: https://t.co/th7YMTeRwK
@KarenFo62979164 We'd suggest to choose a subject that doesn't require any flight details in order to avoid this error (Service Complaints for example.) The colleagues will review your request.

urls.title: Wizz Europe Oct-Nov '22 Full mag
urls.description: Created with the Heyzine flipbook maker

data.text:
To celebrate 1,900 years (yes, really) since Hadrian's Wall was bulit, kaleidoscopic installation by Morag Myerscough has created a riot of colour. Read more about it in WIZZ magazine 👉 https://t.co/ia9PvUhnx0

📷: @EnglishHeritage https://t.co/wD4XRpTYD7

urls.title: Aviation Graduate, Trainee & Internship Jobs | Wizz Air
urls.description: We're looking for young talent. Join the Wizz management trainee program for the opportunity to work with industry experts at Wizz Air HQ in Budapest, Hungary.

data.text:
Kickstart your career while you're still studying! 💡✈️
Join this year's WIZZ Management Trainee Program and land yourself a job in the world of aviation right after you finish university. 👉 https://t.co/WwsBXTTXB1 https://t.co/KMOELQJxYc

data.text: We won't tell you the solution, but just so you know, you could save enough money with today's promotion to book another trip right away. Or maybe wait for tomorrow's discount with that one 😉 https://t.co/AeMNWOKuvd https://t.co/UWNgpYOZ2H

data.text: @WellsWells1 Hi There! We're truly sorry for the inconvenience. Due to the busy summer season, there may be delays in receiving responses from our customer relations team. However, without exception, all registered claims will be processed as soon as possible. We thank you for your patience.
